description: This file declares API functions for the CCSP management server component, including functions for parameter values, attributes, table rows, and parameter names management using DBus.

methods.name: CcspManagementServer_SetParameterValues
methods.description: Sets multiple parameter values on the management server, with the option to commit changes.

methods.name: CcspManagementServer_SetCommit
methods.description: Commits or rolls back parameter changes based on the commit flag.

methods.name: CcspManagementServer_GetParameterValues
methods.description: Retrieves current values of specified parameters.

methods.name: CcspManagementServer_AddTblRow
methods.description: Adds a new row to a table object identified by objectName.

methods.name: CcspManagementServer_DeleteTblRow
methods.description: Deletes a table row identified by objectName and instance number.

methods.name: CcspManagementServer_GetParameterNames
methods.description: Retrieves parameter names for a specified object.
